text: John J. Cullerton (born October 28, 1948) is an American politician. He is a Democratic member of the Illinois Senate. He represents the 6th district since his appointment in 1991. He was elected President of the Illinois Senate in 2009.Blagojevich oversees Senate swearing-in as impeachment trial looms, Chicago Tribune, Jan. 14, 2009. ==References== ==Other websites== *Biography, bills and committees at the 98th Illinois General Assembly **By session: 98th, 97th, 96th, 95th, 94th, 93rd *Illinois Senate President John Cullerton legislative website *Senate President John J. Cullerton at Illinois Senate Democrats * *Collected news and commentary at the Chicago Tribune Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Illinois Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Members of the Illinois General Assembly
title: John Cullerton
